vectorBackground - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Color of the vector plot background.
vectorBackgroundColorCoding - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Set true to create a color coded background, based on the values in the specified data column (e.g. vorticity).
vectorBackgroundColorCodingColumn - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Specifys the column number used for the color coded background, zero for the first column.
vectorBackgroundColorCodingMax - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Value used for the highest color (red).
vectorBackgroundColorCodingMin - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Value used for the lowest color (blue).
vectorBackgroundImage - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Set true to use a pixel image as background.
vectorBackgroundImagePath - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Location of the background image.
vectorBorder - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The background color outside the vector field.
vectorColor - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Color of the vectors.
vectorColorBarFormatString - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Define a decimal format for the color bar.
vectorColorBarLabel - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Label of the color legend (e.g. the used unit).
vectorColorBarUnitConversion - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Conversion factor of the color bar labels to assign the colors to values in a different unit than pixel.
vectorColorInvalid - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Color of invalid vectors (negative value in fifth column).
vectorColorLevels - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The number of color levels for the color coding.
vectorHeadLength - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Fraction of vector length used by the arrow head.
vectorLength - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The uniform length, if vectorUniformLength=True
vectorLengthThreshold - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Use scaling below this threshold, if vectorUniformLength=True
vectorMultiColor - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Set true to use a color code for the vector length.
vectorMultiColorMax - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Value represented by the highest color (red).
vectorMultiColorMin - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Value represented by the lowest color (blue).
vectorMultiColorTransparancy - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Transparancy (0=fully transparent, 1=fully opaque).
vectorReferenceLabel - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Label of the reference vector (e.g. the unit used).
vectorReferenceLength - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Length of the reference vector in pixel.
vectorReferenceUnitConversion - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Conversion factor to draw the reference vector in a different unit than pixel.
vectorScale - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Scaling factor for plotting vectors.
vectorShowColorBar - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Set true to display a color legend.
vectorShowReference - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Set true to plot a reference vector.
vectorTickSpacing - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The spacing of the axes tickmarks.
vectorUniformLength - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
If true, print all vectors with a uniform length.
vectorXOffset - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The width of the space between plot border and left upright axis.
vectorYOffset - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
The space between plot border and the top horizontal axis.
